verses.text: Now the children of Israel after their number , \add to wit\add*, the chief fathers and captains of thousands and hundreds , and their officers that served the king in any matter of the courses , which came in and went out month by month throughout all the months of the year , of every course \add were\add* twenty and four thousand.
Over the first course for the first month \add was\add* Jashobeam the son of Zabdiel : and in his course \add were\add* twenty and four thousand.
Of the children of Perez \add was\add* the chief of all the captains of the host for the first month.

And over the course of the second month \add was\add* Dodai an Ahohite , and of his course \add was\add* Mikloth also the ruler : in his course likewise \add were\add* twenty and four thousand.\f + \fr 27.4 \ft Dodai: also called, Dodo\f*

The third captain of the host for the third month \add was\add* Benaiah the son of Jehoiada , a chief priest : and in his course \add were\add* twenty and four thousand.\f + \fr 27.5 \ft chief…: or, principal officer\f*
This \add is that\add* Benaiah , \add who was\add* mighty \add among\add* the thirty , and above the thirty : and in his course \add was\add* Ammizabad his son.
The fourth \add captain\add* for the fourth month \add was\add* Asahel the brother of Joab , and Zebadiah his son after him: and in his course \add were\add* twenty and four thousand.
The fifth captain for the fifth month \add was\add* Shamhuth the Izrahite : and in his course \add were\add* twenty and four thousand.
The sixth \add captain\add* for the sixth month \add was\add* Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite : and in his course \add were\add* twenty and four thousand.
The seventh \add captain\add* for the seventh month \add was\add* Helez the Pelonite , of the children of Ephraim : and in his course \add were\add* twenty and four thousand.
The eighth \add captain\add* for the eighth month \add was\add* Sibbecai the Hushathite , of the Zarhites : and in his course \add were\add* twenty and four thousand.
The ninth \add captain\add* for the ninth month \add was\add* Abi-ezer the Anetothite , of the Benjamites : and in his course \add were\add* twenty and four thousand.
The tenth \add captain\add* for the tenth month \add was\add* Maharai the Netophathite , of the Zarhites : and in his course \add were\add* twenty and four thousand.
The eleventh \add captain\add* for the eleventh month \add was\add* Benaiah the Pirathonite , of the children of Ephraim : and in his course \add were\add* twenty and four thousand.

The twelfth \add captain\add* for the twelfth month \add was\add* Heldai the Netophathite , of Othniel : and in his course \add were\add* twenty and four thousand.\f + \fr 27.15 \ft Heldai: also called, Heled\f* \p
¶ Furthermore over the tribes of Israel : the ruler of the Reubenites \add was\add* Eliezer the son of Zichri : of the Simeonites , Shephatiah the son of Maachah :
Of the Levites , Hashabiah the son of Kemuel : of the Aaronites , Zadok :
Of Judah , Elihu , \add one\add* of the brethren of David : of Issachar , Omri the son of Michael :\f + \fr 27.18 \ft Elihu: also called, Eliab\f*
Of Zebulun , Ishmaiah the son of Obadiah : of Naphtali , Jerimoth the son of Azriel :
Of the children of Ephraim , Hoshea the son of Azaziah : of the half tribe of Manasseh , Joel the son of Pedaiah :
Of the half \add tribe\add* of Manasseh in Gilead , Iddo the son of Zechariah : of Benjamin , Jaasiel the son of Abner :
Of Dan , Azareel the son of Jeroham. These \add were\add* the princes of the tribes of Israel. \p
¶ But David took not the number of them from twenty years old and under : because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had said he would increase Israel like to the stars of the heavens.

Joab the son of Zeruiah began to number , but he finished not, because there fell wrath for it against Israel ; neither was the number put in the account of the chronicles of king David.\f + \fr 27.24 \ft was: Heb. ascended\f* \p

¶ And over the king’s treasures \add was\add* Azmaveth the son of Adiel : and over the storehouses in the fields , in the cities , and in the villages , and in the castles , \add was\add* Jehonathan the son of Uzziah :
And over them that did the work of the field for tillage of the ground \add was\add* Ezri the son of Chelub :

And over the vineyards \add was\add* Shimei the Ramathite : over the increase of the vineyards for the wine cellars \add was\add* Zabdi the Shiphmite :\f + \fr 27.27 \ft over the increase…: Heb. over that which was of the vineyards\f*
And over the olive trees and the sycomore trees that \add were\add* in the low plains \add was\add* Baal-hanan the Gederite : and over the cellars of oil \add was\add* Joash :
And over the herds that fed in Sharon \add was\add* Shitrai the Sharonite : and over the herds \add that were\add* in the valleys \add was\add* Shaphat the son of Adlai :
Over the camels also \add was\add* Obil the Ishmaelite : and over the asses \add was\add* Jehdeiah the Meronothite :
And over the flocks \add was\add* Jaziz the Hagerite. All these \add were\add* the rulers of the substance which \add was\add* king David’s.

Also Jonathan David’s uncle was a counsellor , a wise man , and a scribe : and Jehiel the son of Hachmoni \add was\add* with the king’s sons :\f + \fr 27.32 \ft scribe: or, secretary\f*\f + \fr 27.32 \ft son…: or, Hachmonite\f*
And Ahithophel \add was\add* the king’s counsellor : and Hushai the Archite \add was\add* the king’s companion :
And after Ahithophel \add was\add* Jehoiada the son of Benaiah , and Abiathar : and the general of the king’s army \add was\add* Joab.
